channel.title: Re-Writing Crafting.java

item.title: Re-Writing Crafting.java
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Heres a little bit of my gemCutting void.

	public void gemtoCut(int UncutId) {
		for (int j = 0; j < CutId; j++) {
			if (CutId == UncutId) {  -- I changed from an array to an enum, but im notsure if its right.
				if (c.playerLevel[c.playerCrafting] >= Level) {
					c.getItems().deleteItem(UncutId, c.getItems().getItemSlot(UncutId),1);
					c.getItems().addItem(CutId, 1);
					c.getPA().addSkillXP(Exp * Config.CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerCrafting);
					break;
				}			
			}		
		}
	}
}

if (gems[j][0] == id) { â€“ original code used for the highlighted part.

My enum ints

private int UncutId;
private int CutId;
private int Level;
private int Exp;
private String UncutName;
private String CutName;

What should it be?
